trans-unit.source: Keyword Reference
Sent by a list-view control when the user activates an item

seg-source.mrk: Sent by a list-view control when the user activates an item

target.mrk: Sent by a list-view control when the user activates an item

trans-unit.source: Parameters
Contains information about a notification message

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about a notification message

target.mrk: Contains information about a notification message

trans-unit.source: Index of the list-view item. If the item index is not used for the notification, this member will contain -1

seg-source.mrk: If the item index is not used for the notification, this member will contain -1

target.mrk: If the item index is not used for the notification, this member will contain -1

trans-unit.source: 1-based index of the subitem. If the subitem index is not used for the notification or the notification does not apply to a subitem, this member will contain zero.

seg-source.mrk: If the subitem index is not used for the notification or the notification does not apply to a subitem, this member will contain zero.

target.mrk: If the subitem index is not used for the notification or the notification does not apply to a subitem, this member will contain zero.

trans-unit.source: New item state. This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it

seg-source.mrk: This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it

target.mrk: This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it

trans-unit.source: Old item state. This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it

seg-source.mrk: This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it

target.mrk: This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it

trans-unit.source: Set of flags that indicate the item attributes that have changed.

seg-source.mrk: Set of flags that indicate the item attributes that have changed.

target.mrk: Set of flags that indicate the item attributes that have changed.

trans-unit.source: This member is zero for notifications that do not use it.

seg-source.mrk: This member is zero for notifications that do not use it.

target.mrk: This member is zero for notifications that do not use it.

trans-unit.source: This member can have one or more of the following flags set:

seg-source.mrk: This member can have one or more of the following flags set:

target.mrk: This member can have one or more of the following flags set:

trans-unit.source: $LVIF_COLUMNS - The Columns member is valid
$LVIF_DI_SETITEM - The operating system should store the requested list item information

seg-source.mrk: $LVIF_DI_SETITEM - The operating system should store the requested list item information

target.mrk: $LVIF_DI_SETITEM - The operating system should store the requested list item information

trans-unit.source: $LVIF_GROUPID - The GroupID member is valid
$LVIF_IMAGE - The Image member is valid
$LVIF_INDENT - The Indent member is valid
$LVIF_NORECOMPUTE - The control will not generate LVN_GETDISPINFO to retrieve text information

seg-source.mrk: $LVIF_NORECOMPUTE - The control will not generate LVN_GETDISPINFO to retrieve text information

target.mrk: $LVIF_NORECOMPUTE - The control will not generate LVN_GETDISPINFO to retrieve text information

trans-unit.source: $LVIF_PARAM - The Param member is valid
$LVIF_STATE - The State member is valid
$LVIF_TEXT - The Text member is valid
Specifies the x-coordinate of the point

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the x-coordinate of the point

target.mrk: Specifies the x-coordinate of the point

trans-unit.source: Specifies the y-coordinate of the point

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the y-coordinate of the point

target.mrk: Specifies the y-coordinate of the point

trans-unit.source: Application-defined value of the item. This member is undefined for notification messages that do not use it

seg-source.mrk: This member is undefined for notification messages that do not use it

target.mrk: This member is undefined for notification messages that do not use it

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys that were pressed at the time of the activation.

seg-source.mrk: Modifier keys that were pressed at the time of the activation.

target.mrk: Modifier keys that were pressed at the time of the activation.

trans-unit.source: This member contains zero or a combination of the following flags:

seg-source.mrk: This member contains zero or a combination of the following flags:

target.mrk: This member contains zero or a combination of the following flags:

trans-unit.source: $LVKF_ALT - The key is pressed.
$LVKF_CONTROL - The key is pressed.
$LVKF_SHIFT - The key is pressed.
